alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 2:43PM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Winds have eased this afternoon however local areas of westerly winds of 25 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph will continue the rest of the afternoon. * WHERE...Western Pima County, Tohono O`odham Nation, South Central Pinal County and Upper Gila River Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust with reduced visibilities could result in difficult travel conditions in dust prone areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
